content: {"name": "Iglesia Cristiana Pentecostal (Christian Pentecost Church)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Distribution at the back of the church parking lot.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.christianpentecostalchurch.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "86 Market St", "address_2": null, "city": "Passaic", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07055", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.864258, "longitude": -74.116403}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 471-5603", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "1 bag per family/person"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}]}
